name: Chess Puzzles
description: This is a puzzle game in which you have to solve various chess problems. A lot of difficult situations, from which you have to go for a few moves.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
